name: FootballandSoccerFactsRegion-friendly
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: football facts
des: The skill works by taking a command from the user asking for football facts or soccer facts. The command works globally, taking commands which demand using the word "soccer" and "football" as well. Access an array of mesmerizing facts using simple commands. Works with ease with a previously employed code which ensures it's working.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
